name: F4SS CI Connect 2016
content: F4SS CI Connect 2016 will be hosted by FedEx Corporation and will explore the theme, "Inside the Hangar: How FedEx Leverages CI to "Keep the World on Time". FedEx Corporation is a world leader in delivery and providing global commerce solutions. At FedEx, Continuous Improvement is critical to the customers’ service -- and to the success of FedEx's business. As innovations continue to reshape the global marketplace, FedEx customers’ needs change quickly. The services they value become more complex and their expectations rise. Join F4SS and FedEx in Memphis Tennessee at F4SS CI Connect 2016 and see how FedEx delivers on their promise to provide superior service and create outstanding experiences for their customers through their commitment to Continuous Improvement. Hear directly from their leadership and team members how their dedication to CI provides differential value for their customers and their company. This event will take place at the beautiful and historic Westin Memphis Beale Street Hotel in Memphis, TN from September 19-21, 2016.
